Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball scored 10 points in 15 minutes in the Bulls' 125-123 preseason victory over the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball expressed gratitude and stated that he felt blessed to be back on the court.
Several players expressed support and respect for Lonzo Ball in the team's postgame meeting.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans rose to their feet as the announcement echoed through the arena.
Coby White presented the game ball and LaVine handed Ball a jersey that appeared to be signed by the team.
